column1: # Instructions: Update prices and modifiers then re-upload to update your products
# Product_ID: Unique Sanity document ID (DO NOT MODIFY)
# Product_Name: Product name for reference (DO NOT MODIFY)
# Qty_XX: Discount percentage for quantity tier (0-100
# Paper_Economy/Standard/Premium: Price modifier per unit in GBP (e.g.
# Finish_None/Gloss/Matt/SoftTouch: Price modifier per unit in GBP (e.g.
# EXAMPLE: A5 Leaflets at £25 base with 5% off for 100 units
